thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tianjin Chase Sun Pharmaceutical unit receives certificate of suitability for european pharmacopeia from EDQM

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tianjin Chase Sun Pharmaceutical unit receives certificate of suitability for european pharmacopeia from EDQM

organizations.name: tianjin chase sun pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Tianjin Chase Sun Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says wholly owned pharmaceutical unit received certificate of suitability for european pharmacopeia (CEP) from European Directorate for the Quality of Medecines(EDQM)
* Certificate issued to etomidate manufactured by the unit and the valid period is five years
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/jgWS2z
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
